item.description:
Let's celebrate Presidents' Day by doing something silly and going to the Bugs Bunny Festival at the Brattle Theater in Harvard Square.

This annual festival is a lot of fun....and you can sip beer or wine while watching cartoons....how can you beat that?

We are going to see THAT FANTASTIC FRIZ, which features the rest of the Looney Tunes, as well as Bugs, in some of the best shorts directed by Friz Freleng – who celebrates his 100th birthday this year!

For more details about the festival:

Bugs Festival

This is a VERY popular event so BUY YOUR TICKETS IN ADVANCE!!!!!

To Buy Tickets Go To:

Vendini Tickets

The theater is located in Harvard Square...the best way to get there is by taking the Red Line.  It is a holiday, so there is free street parking...but good luck finding a spot, especially with all the snow out there.

After the movie, we will adjourn to a nearby eating establishment for munchies and bevies and social hobnobbing.

Hope to see you there.

Doreen aka: Wascally Wabbit
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing my meetup pin and waiting outside the theater until they let us inside where I will wait in the lobby till 5:30 or so...when we will head in for seats.
item.name: Bugs Bunny Film Festival: THAT FANTASTIC FRIZ (6PM Showtime)
